handist.collections.accumulator

Interface Accumulator.ThreadLocalAccumulator<A>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - the type of the accumulator used to collect data
    Enclosing class:
    Accumulator<A>

    public static interface Accumulator.ThreadLocalAccumulator<A>
    ThreadLocalAccumulator provided as parameter when accumulating information inside accumulators. This interface provides access to the individual accumulators of type A.

    Internally, various accumulator allocation strategies can be used (on-demand, fixed initialization on specific ranges defined in advance) and are implemented into the specializations of class Accumulator.

    Author:
    Patrick Finnerty

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      A acquire(long idx)
      Provides the accumulator instance dedicated to this thread for the specified index.
      ChunkedList<A> acquire(LongRange range)
      Obtains the accumulators for the range specified by the parameter.
      ChunkedList<A> getChunkedList()
      Returns the underlying ChunkedList containing the accumulators
      Collection<LongRange> ranges()
      Returns the ranges that the current thread-local accumulator has internally initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        A acquire(long idx)
        Provides the accumulator instance dedicated to this thread for the specified index. This method may throw Exceptions if the allocation contract of the underlying Accumulator is not respected.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of the accumulator desired
        Returns:
        the accumulator object for this index

      • acquire

        ChunkedList<A> acquire(LongRange range)
        Obtains the accumulators for the range specified by the parameter.

        This method may throw an Exception if the allocation contract of the underlying Accumulator is not respected.

        Parameters:
        range - the range of accumulators to obtain from the thread-local accumulator
        Returns:
        ranged list of accumulators containing the specified range

      • getChunkedList

        ChunkedList<A> getChunkedList()
        Returns the underlying ChunkedList containing the accumulators

        Internal-use only. Call at your own peril.

        Returns:
        the underlying ChunkedList containing the accumulators of this Accumulator.ThreadLocalAccumulator

      • ranges

        Collection<LongRange> ranges()
        Returns the ranges that the current thread-local accumulator has internally initialized.
        Returns:
        collection of LongRange present in this accumulator
